title: Manage VIP Suite Catering Order
description: A corporate partner who has a VIP suite for a game wants to pre-order catering.

tasks.description: Identify the corporate partner and their suite number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the partner's booking details.

tasks.description: Provide the partner with the suite catering menu and take their order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the menu and records the partner's food and beverage selections.

tasks.description: Process the payment for the catering order and send the order to the kitchen.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the payment and confirms the order with the catering team.
